name: Cloud-Shaped Pink and Mocha Spotted Porcelain Earrings
description:
I cannot get enough of this pale mocha paired with a hint of a sweet pink glaze. Such an elegant and chic color combo that can be dressed up or down. The pale brown glaze pools nicely between the raised dots, and the pink glaze around the edge gives these lovelies a perfect *pop* of color. Think about these for Spring, ladies!

These are a quick seller and I've only got two more pairs of these pretty earrings in stock so if you want them you'd better grab 'em! Don't forget I offer FREE SHIPPING on all orders!

Because of the nature of this particular glaze and texture, each pair of earrings is unique and may have different variations in darkness/lightness of color.

These are approximately 1.25 inches wide and about 1.5 inches long from the lobe and such a great size & shape!

These earrings hang on handwrought sterling silver earwires. I custom make each pair of earwires to compliment the overall design of the earring and to be comfortable for the wearer.

name: Striking Starburst Porcelain Earrings in Black and White
description:
These are a great bold, graphic design, hand painted with a lucious, satiny black glaze. This design is unlike any other ceramic jewelry you'll see on Etsy.

These are surprisingly lightweight and really bring lots of attention to the face. They've also got a bit of a retro flair, so they're perfect for adding style and pizazz to that special vintage outfit.Hanging about 2 inches from the lobe at their lowest point, these earrings have a diameter of about 1.25 inches.

These earrings hang on handwrought sterling silver earwires. I custom make each pair of earwires to compliment the overall design of the earring and to be comfortable for the wearer.

All Sweet Mud jewelry is created in small batches, and though many designs are duplicated on a very small scale no two pairs of Sweet Mud earrings are exactly the same. Because Sweet Mud jewelry is completely handcrafted some of the glazes may turn out *slightly* differently than pictured. I make every effort to ensure each piece is accurately described, photographed, and represented.

Feel free to contact me with any questions or inquiries.

Sweet Mud Clay Works
making something *purdy* out of something *dirty*

name: Pink Fleur Porcelain Drop Earrings
description:
Made of an extremely high quality porcelain clay body, these earrings are very chic and sophisticated with a sweet pink glaze and a nice black decorative floral design in the center.

The size of the porcelain piece measures about 1/2 inch at the widest point and hangs about 1 inch from the lobe. A great size and shape to add a lovely bit of color to your day.

These earrings hang on handwrought sterling silver earwires. I custom make each pair of earwires to compliment the overall design of the earring and to be comfortable for the wearer.

All Sweet Mud jewelry is created in small batches, and though many designs are duplicated on a very small scale no two pairs of Sweet Mud earrings are exactly the same. Because Sweet Mud jewelry is completely handcrafted some of the glazes may turn out *slightly* differently than pictured. name: Teal and Chocolate Porcelain Frame Necklace
description:
This design is by far my BEST selling earring design so I now offer it to you as a necklace! This is a great color combo for every season - teal and chocolate brown! Very chic!

This is a fabulous shape and has a great texture with a grid pattern and accenting dots. The size of the porcelain pendant is about 1.5 inches square and comes to you strung on an 18-inch sterling silver beaded ball chain.

name: Faux Leather Fishnets Porcelain Earrings in Red and Black
description:
The Red/Black color combo is all the rage right now and is reflected in fashion, hair color, and even kitchen appliances! It's certainly popular for a reason. The luscious black glaze on these earrings contrasts so nicely with the shiny bright red accent color, and the fishnet texture is *truly* distinctive. You won't find earrings like this anywhere else!

These great red and black porcelain earrings are about 1.5 inches long and hang about 2 inches from the lobe.

These earrings hang on handwrought sterling silver earwires. I custom make each pair of earwires to compliment the overall design of the earring and to be comfortable for the wearer.

name: Teal and Chocolate Porcelain Frame Earrings
description:
This design is by far my BEST seller! Here's a great color combo for the season - teal and chocolate brown! Very chic!

These are a fabulous shape and a great texture with a grid pattern and accenting dots. The size of the porcelain piece is about 1.25 inches at the widest point and hangs about 1.75 inches from the lobe.

These earrings hang on handwrought sterling silver earwires. I custom make each pair of earwires to compliment the overall design of the earring and to be comfortable for the wearer.

name: Ebony and Ivory Striped Porcelain Earrings
description:
These striking earrings are diamond-shaped and have a great black and white striped pattern. Show your ears some love with these fabulously bold earrings!

These measure about 1.75 inches at their widest point and hang about 2.5 inches from the lobe. A great length and surprisingly lightweight for such a substantial earring!

These earrings hang on handwrought sterling silver earwires. I custom make each pair of earwires to compliment the overall design of the earring and to be comfortable for the wearer.

name: S A L E :: Ribbons Porcelain Earrings in Seafoam
description:
Here's another eye-catching design exclusive to Sweet Mud! This is from our line called "Ribbons" - the beautiful glazes really stand up against the warm white background of the bare porcelain. This is a very feminine design with a sweet minty, seafoam green glaze.

These are normally $64, but today they're priced to sell! Clearing out space in the studio for new pieces.

Hanging about 1.75 inches from the lobe at their lowest point, these earrings have a diameter of about 1.25 inches. (See LARGE ROUND on sizing chart for reference).

These earrings hang on handwrought sterling silver earwires. I custom make each pair of earwires to compliment the overall design of the earring and to be comfortable for the wearer.

All Sweet Mud jewelry is created in small batches, and though many designs are duplicated on a very small scale no two pairs of Sweet Mud earrings are exactly the same. Because Sweet Mud jewelry is completely handcrafted some of the glazes may turn out *slightly* differently than pictured. name: Feminine Pocelain Frame Earrings in Pink and Mocha
description:
This shape is by far my BEST seller! Here's a really nice color combo with the pale mocha brown and the lovely bubble gum pink. Very feminine!

These are a fabulous shape and have a great warm glaze with a slight crackled effect. The size of the porcelain piece is about 1.25 inches at the widest point and hangs about 1.75 inches from the lobe. 

These earrings hang on handwrought sterling silver earwires. I custom make each pair of earwires to compliment the overall design of the earring and to be comfortable for the wearer.

name: Porcelain Square Frame Earrings in Satin Black and Red
description:
This shape is by far my BEST seller! And this is one of my most popular color combos - BLACK and RED. Yum!

These just really *pop* against the skin. That bright red glaze around the perimeter is such a lovely contrast to the smooth satin black glaze on the surface. The size of the porcelain pieces is about 1.25 inches at their widest point and they hang about 1.75 inches from the lobe. 

These earrings hang on handwrought sterling silver earwires. I custom make each pair of earwires to compliment the overall design of the earring and to be comfortable for the wearer.

description:

These are surprisingly lightweight and really bring lots of attention to the face. They've also got a bit of a retro flair, so they're perfect for adding style and pizazz to that special vintage outfit.

name: Faux Leather Fishnets Porcelain Necklace in Black and Red
description:
This is a very popular pendant design. The Faux Leather Fishnets design has great texture that is accentuated by a bright red glaze.

The size of the pendant measures about 2 inches long by 1.5 inches wide. This pendant comes strung on a 16-inch black rubber necklace which compliments the luscious satin black glaze nicely.

All Sweet Mud jewelry is created in small batches, and though many designs are duplicated on a very small scale no two pieces of Sweet Mud jewelry are exactly the same. name: Star Shaped Starburst Earrings in Mint and Chocolate
description:
These brand new cuties are sure to bring in loads of compliments. This is a new 6-point star-shaped earring never before offered in the Sweet Mud shop!

These are a great bold, graphic design, hand painted with bright soft green and rich chocolate glazes. They are super lightweight and really bring lots of attention to the face.

Hanging about 1 inch from the lobe at their lowest point, these earrings are about 1/2 inch wide in all directions. These earrings hang on handwrought sterling silver earwires. name: Red Parasol Porcelain Earrings, Large Diamonds
description:
This is one of my personal favorite designs to wear every day. A hand-drawn image of a dainty red parasol is fired onto this pair of diamond shaped earrings. The delicate raindrops are hand-painted in a lovely shade of blue. Perfect to wear any time of year.

The size of the porcelain measures about 1.75 inches long by 1 inch wide. These are a substantial sized earring but not heavy at all. Wear them daily with confidence!

All Sweet Mud jewelry is created in small batches, and though many designs are duplicated on a very small scale no two pieces of Sweet Mud jewelry are exactly the same.
